navigation.servicePlansDescription: Choose a monthly, quaterly or yearly recurring payment and get discounted quality services
navigation.shopifyBuildsDescription: Custom Shopify store builds, theme development, and full eCommerce solutions tailored to your brand.
navigation.shopifyAppsDescription: Custom Shopify app development, integrations, and automation to extend your store's functionality.

hero.title: Shopify & Shopify Plus Custom Development
hero.subtitle: eCommerce Custom Solutions
hero.description: We are Shopify partners and experienced developers, so you can be sure you are in great hands!

cookieBar.info: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Some are essential for basic functionality, while others help us improve and personalize your experience. By clicking 'Allow all' you consent to the use of all cookies.

noblesseTheme.title: Our First Official Shopify Theme!
noblesseTheme.description: We're very happy to launch Noblesse, our first Shopify Theme, perfectly adapted to fashion, jewellery and beauty!
noblesseTheme.description2: We wanted to create something different, for brands that want to stand out without the need for custom coding, but still CRO oriented.

homepageServices.title: Take your store to the next level
homepageServices.subtitle: You deserve high quality services from people who know their stuff. We know our stuff - that's a promise!
homepageServices.cta: Oh, and we can do much more than that!

mainForm.title: Talk to a Strategist
mainForm.subtitle: Get in touch with us if you want to get a quote for your project or simply want to say hello! We'd love to hear from you!

servicePlans.enterprisePlanDescription: This plan is catered directly on the needs of your company. We fully integrate in your business and cover all your technical requirements.
